Message.Title: Momentum Picking up in MISM
Message.Msg: MISM looks prime for a move higher. I have been researching it for a while.

Topic.Title: KO will pay dividend of 28 cents as a date of record date of 06/12/13 and paid on 07/01/13

Message.Msg: I believe 6/12 is the X-DIVIDEND date not the stock of record date.
